Monday

Web Development

Currently on monday mornings I am live coding a Twitter clone. Not a different version of Twitter but an actual clone. Implementing a variety of techniques to streamline the markup while teaching (and as always learning) my process.

At the end of the 7th day (two hour streams) we had a full frontend re-creation and began doing some refactoring to try out a minimal class CSS approach.

The code is pushed to GitHub each week so that you can follow along, or come by the stream and chat or ask questions!

Wednesday

Creative Stream

A creative hangout space to work on fun personal projects (like this website!). Recently, i've been dabbling in pixel art and game development using Aseprite and the Godot Engine.

Come hang out, chat, learn and have fun! Have an art project of your own? Bring it to the stream to show me I would love to see it!

5pm - 7pm (PST)
